sentences.sentence: Wheat (Triticum aestivum L. ) is an important and a major crop not only in China but also in the world.
sentences.translation: 小麦是中国和世界上最重要的粮食作物之一，但其生产正受到虫害日益严重的威胁。

sentences.sentence: Einkorn wheat is the donor species of polyploidy wheat. It is one of the important basic species of Triticum.
sentences.translation: 一粒系小麦是多倍体小麦染色体组的供体物种之一，是小麦的重要基础物种。

sentences.sentence: D. villosum (H. villosa) , which is the relative genus of Triticum, was the important resources for wheat improvement.
sentences.translation: 簇毛麦是小麦的近缘属，是小麦改良重要的基因资源。
